description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints for health check, documentation redirect, application info, and a welcome message.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: REST controller providing basic endpoints such as health check, documentation redirect, and application info for the notes backend.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a greeting message, serving as the root endpoint.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' status indicating application health.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
